title: Snow Day After School Activities
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>It’s so snowy today~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>What should we do today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hmm... Maybe make snowmen?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Let’s make 13 snowmen and show them to everyone.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Good idea! We can decorate them to match each member.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I have some ribbons left over from making our costumes.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Great. Let’s go make some ribbons for our snowmen~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Okay. Rina-chan Board says, “All smiles.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Let’s keep them a secret until we’re done.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Sure. It’ll be our secret.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
